title: Research
text: My graduate research focuses on questions related to how speakers use socio-indexical information in the process of speech perception. I have recently completed a speech perception experiment at UC Davis that will serve as bais of my qualifying paper for PhD candidacy in Linguistics.

title: About
text: I am a graduate student at the Department of Linguistics at UC Davis. This is an example of a student website created using quarto and hosted on GitHub Pages. Feel free to use this template for your own website.
